page.title: 03HOUSING - WEST CHESTERFIELD
page.content: Within the area of West Chesterfield there are a number of different types of houses. Towards the edge of Chesterfield there is a distinct change in age and style. The{Brookside area has many old terraced houses. These are mainly two storey and in long rows or terraces. On the very edge of the town the houses are much larger and are detached. Most of these have at least one garage and cost between Â£50 000-Â£60 000. The{Loundsley Green}area was built by the council to house many Londoners who have moved to Chesterfield in recent years. Many of these houses are now privately owned. Some recently built houses are valued at nearly Â£60 000. The estate is a mixture of semi-detached and detached properties. This was to try to avoid building the houses all the same.
